scenarios.title: Grievance Handling Scenario
scenarios.description: In this scenario, you'll practice handling a grievance from a union member regarding unfair treatment in the workplace.
objectives: Gather all relevant information from the member
Identify any potential violations of the collective agreement
Determine appropriate next steps (e.g., informal resolution, formal grievance)
Communicate effectively with the member throughout the process
prompts: Unfair treatment affecting your family life?

scenarios.title: Collective Bargaining Scenario
scenarios.description: This scenario focuses on the process of negotiating a new collective agreement between the union and management.
objectives: Prepare and present proposals for improved working conditions
Analyze and respond to management's counter-proposals
Use effective negotiation techniques to reach mutually beneficial agreements
Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations during the bargaining process
prompts: Want better job security in changing times?
Need support for fair wages and benefits?

scenarios.title: Workplace Safety Scenario
scenarios.description: In this scenario, you'll address safety concerns raised by union members and work towards improving workplace safety conditions.
objectives: Conduct a thorough workplace safety inspection
Document and report potential safety hazards
Collaborate with management to develop and implement safety improvements
Educate union members on their rights and responsibilities regarding workplace safety
prompts: Want to ensure a safe environment for all?

scenarios.title: Member Representation Scenario
scenarios.description: This scenario involves representing a union member in a disciplinary hearing with management.
objectives: Review the details of the alleged misconduct and gather supporting evidence
Prepare a defense strategy for the member
Represent the member's interests during the disciplinary hearing
Negotiate for fair treatment and appropriate disciplinary measures, if necessary
prompts: Need support in a workplace dispute?
Want to protect your rights at work?

scenarios.title: Union Leadership Scenario
scenarios.description: In this scenario, you'll practice skills required for effective union leadership and organization.
objectives: Develop strategies to increase union membership and engagement
Plan and conduct effective union meetings
Address internal conflicts and maintain unity within the union
Communicate union goals and achievements to members and the public
prompts: Want to make a difference for your coworkers?
Interested in building a stronger union community?
Ready to advocate for better working conditions?
